mapper.sql: M.BUSNO, M.DCMNO, M.BILLNO, M.STATUS, M.CREATETIME, M.LASTTIME, C.ROWID, C.WAREID, C.WAREQTY, C.PURPRICE
M.BUSNO, M.DCMNO, M.BILLNO, M.CREATETIME, M.LASTTIME, C.ROWID, C.WAREID, C.WAREQTY, C.SALEPRICE
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM D_DCM_GET_LOG WHERE TYPE = #{type, jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_DCM_GET_LOG () VALUES(#{iTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type, jdbcType=DECIMAL})
